title: Mux - Metrics
description: This dashboard will provide detailed metric information on MUX metrics and video performance.

definition.content:
**[Mux](https://www.mux.com/)** is an all-in-one video streaming platform designed for developers and businesses. It offers APIs and tools for video hosting, live streaming, web player customization, and in-depth analytics, enabling users to easily create, manage, and optimize video content. 

This **Mux Metrics** Dashboard provides comprehensive insights, including views, unique viewers, playing time, viewer experience score, playback success score, player startup time, smoothness score, video quality score, and rebuffer percentage, with the latest metrics showcasing consolidated statistics for video performance.

For more information, see the [Mux Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/mux/).


**Note**:
- The dashboard widgets show the latest metric values captured for each Mux metrics.

**Tip**:
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Top Videos with High Viewer Experience Score
Top Videos with High Playback Success Score
Top Videos with High Playback Failure Percentage
Top Videos with High Smoothness Score
Top Videos with High Quality Score
